channel.description: Recent content in gcp on Olivia Snowden's Blog

item.title: BUILDING LOAD BALANCERS IN GCP WITH TERRAFORM
item.description: If you ever try to write Terraform code to create a load balancer in GCP you may find it is not as straightforward as you would like. There is not a single Terraform resource to create a GCP load balancer, and making sure the load balancer is configured to do what you need can be difficult. However if you have an understanding of how load balancers work internally, and how to properly structure your Terraform code, creating load balancers in GCP using Terraform is possible.
